txt.en: You distracted the guard well enough for Ayaluk to search and escape. Return to his hiding spot near the building east of Ulanor's office.
Ayaluk asked you to distract the guard while he sneaks into Ulanor's office to find proof of her wrongdoing.
'What I found is worse than I feared. I need some time to review this information. Meet me at my home. Now I must go!'
Distract the guard by waving good-bye <rgb=#FF0000>/bye</rgb>
'Let's make haste and do not be seen.'
Distract the guard by hailing him <rgb=#FF0000>/hail</rgb>
Distract the guard by clearing your throat <rgb=#00FF00>/ahem</rgb>
Speak with Ayaluk near his original hiding spot
The guard returned to his post and Ayaluk was caught
Distract the guard with a <rgb=#00FF00>/hail</rgb>
You distracted the guard and Ayaluk escaped
Keep the guard distracted for one full minute
When the guard starts walking again, distract him by waving <rgb=#00FF00>/bye</rgb>
You agreed to assist Ayaluk in obtaining proof of the overseer's wrongdoing in Rakhat√¢b.
Speak with Ayaluk at a building near Ulanor's chambers
You distracted the guard and Ayaluk escaped

'I only need you to distract the guard for a few moments while I search the office. Distract the guard however you can. Annoy them if you must. Wave bye, hail them, clear your throat at them. Anything to keep them occupied.'
Keep the guard distracted for at least two minutes
Instance: Whispers of the Forge
Meet Ayaluk at the edge of the building near the overseer's chambers.
